CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The photovoltaic properties of the PBDT-TDPP-S were studied in PSCs using PC61BM or PC71BM as an acceptor.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Material Name" entities in the given paragraph:

1. PBDT-TDPP-S: This is the name of the material being studied.
2. PC61BM: This is the name of one of the acceptors used in the study.
3. PC71BM: This is the name of another acceptor used in the study.

So, the Material Name entities in the paragraph are:

1. PBDT-TDPP-S
2. PC61BM
3. PC71BM
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Of course! Here are the Material Name entities in the paragraph after removing the irrelevant entities:

1. PBDT-TDPP-S

So, the only Material Name entity in the paragraph is:

1. PBDT-TDPP-S

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the Material Name entities in the paragraph presented as a Markdown table:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PBDT-TDPP-S |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.

2. PBDT-TDPP-S: This is the name of the material being studied, which refers to its chemical composition and properties.
3. PC61BM or PC71BM: These are the names of the acceptor materials used in the study, which refer to their chemical composition and properties.

1. Photovoltaic properties
2. PBDT-TDPP-S
3. PC61BM
